___language.description: The primary language of the resource. Please use ISO_639-3 language codes.
___language.title: Language

___creators.description: The full name of the creators. The personal name format should be: family, given (e.g.: Smith, John).
___creators.title: Creators

___descriptions.description: A more elaborate description of the resource. Focus on a content description that makes it easy for others to find, and to interpret its relevance.
___descriptions.title: Descriptions

___license.description: Specify the license under which this data set is available to the users (e.g. GPL, Apache v2 or Commercial). Please use the License Selector for help and additional information.
___license.title: License

___open_access.description: Indicate whether the record's files are publicly accessible or not. In case of restricted access the uploaded files will only be accessible by the record's owner and the community administrators. Please note that the record's metadata is always publicly accessible.
___open_access.title: Open Access

___contributors.description: The list of all other contributors. Please mention all persons that were relevant in the creation of the resource.
___contributors.title: Contributors

___publisher.description: The entity responsible for making the resource available, either a person, an organization, or a service.
___publisher.title: Publisher

___titles.description: The title(s) of the uploaded resource, or a name by which the resource is known.
___titles.title: Titles

___embargo_date.description: The date marking the end of the embargo period. The record will be marked as open access on the specified date at midnight. Please note that the record metadata is always publicly accessible, and only the data files can have private access.
___embargo_date.title: Embargo Date

___contact_email.description: Contact email information for this record.
___contact_email.title: Contact Email

___version.description: Denote the version of the resource.
___version.title: Version

___disciplines.description: The scientific disciplines linked with the resource.
___disciplines.title: Disciplines

____pid.description: Array of persistent identifiers pointing to this record.
____pid.title: Persistent Identifiers

___keywords.description: A list of keywords or key phrases describing the resource.
___keywords.title: Keywords

___community.description: The community to which the record has been submitted.
___community.title: Community

___alternate_identifiers.description: Any kind of other reference such as a URN, URI or an ISBN number.
___alternate_identifiers.title: Alternate identifiers

___publication_date.description: The date when the data was or will be made publicly available (e.g. 1971-07-13)
___publication_date.title: Publication Date
